description: A dreamlike scene depicting two figures, their bodies twisted and contorted in mid-struggle, set against a backdrop of swirling clouds and misty mountains. The combatants' faces are obscured by shadows, while their limbs seem to blur together in a frenzied dance. A deep blue-green hue dominates the palette, punctuated by flashes of fiery orange and burning yellow.

A vibrant, dreamlike scene featuring a sprawling tree with thick, dark branches stretching upwards towards the sky, its trunk and roots merging with abstract shapes and swirling lines in shades of blue and green. The surrounding environment is bathed in warm, golden light, with subtle suggestions of architecture or buildings in the distance. The overall composition is characterized by dynamic movement and energetic brushstrokes, blending figurative and non-figurative elements into a symphony of color and form.
